metadata.title: CVE-2021-39946 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Improper neutralization of user input in GitLab CE/EE versions 14.3 to14.3.6, 14.4 to 14.4.4, and 14.5 to 14.5.2 allowed an attacker to exploitXSS by abusing the generation of the HTML code related to emojis

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
